duties_responsibilities.duty: Process customer orders quickly, accurately, and efficiently, ensuring complete customer satisfaction.
Handle customer cash, credit/debit payments, and change, and assist customers with information and complaints.
Follow front end procedures, assist with stocking shelves, facing, and dusting as necessary.
Maintain knowledge of weekly ad items, provide directions to customers, and communicate with management.
Ensure checkout areas are properly maintained in a clean and orderly condition at all times.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, 1-2 years of recent cashiering experience
